Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK Function: 404H Stop Digital Recording Request

Discussion


Input:

AX = 404H
BX = Driver number

Output:

None

This function stops digital sound recording at the end of the current buffer. Its operation is otherwise identical to Function 402H (Stop Digital Playback Request).


Group: DOS Digital Sound Driver Interface
